entry.title: Reese's Nutrageous King Size - 87g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

Reese's Nutrageous King Size Candy Bar

Reese's Nutrageous is a candy bar made by the Hershey Company that was first introduced in 1994. It may not be one of the oldest chocolate bars in the world, but like all Reese's products, it has staying power. It consists of Reese's Peanut Butter Cups topped with caramel covered roasted peanuts and and is covered with a chocolate coating.

Big Hunk Candy Bar

A Big Hunk of Sweet Love since the 1950's!

Big Hunk Candy Bar is a delicious, chewy and honey sweetened nougat bar with whole roasted peanuts.This old fashioned candy has been around since the 1950's. Originally created by the Golden Nugget Candy Company but purchased by the wonderful and sweet Annabelle Candy Company in the 1970's. The Big Hunk Candy Bar lives up to it's name with its generous weight of 1.5Â oz. filled with whole roasted peanuts and measures over 8 inches long.
